title: Ahmaud Arbery's family attorney vows to oppose federal plea deal with Travis and Gregory McMichael on hate crime charges in 2020 murder - CNN
content:
1. Ahmaud Arbery's family attorney vows to oppose federal plea deal with Travis and Gregory McMichael on hate crime charges in 2020 murder  CNN
  2. Plea deal reached with two of Ahmaud Arbery's murderers in hate crimes trial  Yahoo News
  3. McMichaels secure plea deal on hate crime charges in murder of Ahmaud Arbery  CBS46 Atlanta
  4. Ahmaud Arbery case: Travis, Greg McMichael reach plea agreements with federal prosecutors  ActionNewsJax.com
  5. Ahmaud Arbery's parents say DOJ 'betrays' their trust with plea deal in federal case for 2 men convi  First Coast News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Gregory and Travis McMichael, the father and son convicted of murder in Ahmaud Arbery's killing, are entering a plea on federal hate crime charges in order to serve their time in a safer, less crowded prison, a lawyer for Arbery's mother said Monday.
